mapper.sql: EXPERT_ID, CATEGORY_ID, TYPE_ID, LEVELS, ENGIN_TYPE, AUDIT_STATUS
mapper.select:
select t1.EXPERT_ID, t1.CATEGORY_ID, t1.TYPE_ID, t1.LEVELS, t1.ENGIN_TYPE ,t2.CODE from T_SES_EMS_EXPERT_CATEGORY t1
, T_SES_BMS_ENG_CATEGORY t2
, T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY t2
where t1.EXPERT_ID = #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t1.CATEGORY_ID=t2.ID
and t1.TYPE_ID = #{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and t1.LEVELS = #{param3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by t2.CODE ASC
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_EMS_EXPERT_CATEGORY (EXPERT_ID, CATEGORY_ID, TYPE_ID, LEVELS, ENGIN_TYPE) values (#{expertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{levels,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engin_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(T2.ID)) FROM T_SES_EMS_EXPERT T2 WHERE INSTR(T2.EXPERTS_TYPE_ID, #{typeId}) > 0 AND (T2.STATUS = 4 OR T2.STATUS = 5 OR T2.STATUS = 6 OR T2.STATUS = 7 OR T2.STATUS = 8) AND T2.IS_PROVISIONAL = '0' AND T2.IS_DELETE = 0
SELECT COUNT(T.EXPERT_ID) FROM T_SES_EMS_EXPERT_CATEGORY T WHERE T.LEVELS = 1 AND T.EXPERT_ID = #{expertId}

SELECT C.TYPE_ID FROM T_SES_EMS_EXPERT_CATEGORY C WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT T.AUDIT_FIELD_ID FROM T_SES_EMS_EXPERT_AUDIT T WHERE C.CATEGORY_ID = T.AUDIT_FIELD_ID AND T.EXPERT_ID = #{expertId} AND T.SUGGEST_TYPE = #{type} AND T.IS_DELETED = 0) AND C.EXPERT_ID = #{expertId} AND C.LEVELS = '1' GROUP BY C.TYPE_ID

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ID,PARENT_ID,NAME FROM
T_SES_BMS_ENG_CATEGORY
T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY
WHERE ID IN (SELECT CATEGORY_ID AS ID FROM T_SES_EMS_EXPERT_CATEGORY WHERE EXPERT_ID = #{expertId}) ) START WITH PARENT_ID = #{typeId} CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = PARENT_ID

SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM
T_SES_BMS_ENG_CATEGORY
T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY
START WITH ID = #{categoryId} CONNECT BY PRIOR PARENT_ID = ID
